price: Nokorε sε Yεde adom a ɛfiri Yεn hͻ maa Dawud, kaa sε: ”Mmepͻ ne nnomaa monka ne ho ne no mmͻ (Nyankopͻn) abodin; na Yεmaa dadeε yεε mmrε maa no.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ مِنَّا فَضۡلٗاۖ يَٰجِبَالُ أَوِّبِي مَعَهُۥ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ ٱلۡحَدِيدَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā dāwūda minnā faḍlan yājibālu awwibī maʿahu wal-ṭayra wa-alannā lahu al-ḥadīda
